name: Relentless Samurai
description:
Relentless Samurai is a fun action-platformer game set in a cyberpunk world! Instructions:

- 3 button game:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Dragon Strike - Mouse Click + Hold and then release elsewhere to use special dash mechanic!

Features:

- 3 button game

- Wall Sliding

- Currently 10 levels and created with UE4!

- Content updates coming soon!

Please Rate if you enjoyed the game at all!
